tasks.name: AnswerUsingFrames
tasks.description: Understand the meaning of a natural language sentence, including unstated, implied consequences to answer a question.
tasks.makes: answers the question in a way that is consistent with the stated (explicit) and unstated (implicit) implications of the statement.

tasks.name: AnalyseRPMCell
tasks.description: Generate a frame-based model of the visual components and spatial relationships within a Raven's Progressive Matrices cell.
tasks.makes: representation reflects elements and spatial relations present in rpmCell

tasks.name: UnderstandNewsStory
tasks.description: Derive structured information from a free-form news article.
tasks.makes: facts extract the information conveyed in story
